data.name: Katana Rama
data.detailed_description:
Katana Rama is a mobility based, fast paced action game where you play as a hacker program, with the mission of breaking out of a digital security system. Coming to Steam 2022.

Settings:
In a digital security fortress. Your mission: to hack through their defenses and retrieve a stolen program as you escape.

Combat:
Mobility Is everything:
-Enemies will unleash barrages of both melee and projectile attacks. Stay mobile is the only way you can stay clear of these attacks. In short: DON'T STOP MOVING.


One Hit One Kill:
-Your weapon has the ability to kill most enemies with one swift attack and at the same time, convert the data of slain enemies into energy. With more enemies slain, more energy is gained.

- With enough energy stored, you can break through doors between chambers or shields of heavier enemies to stun them. Allowing you to go for the kill.



Other Features:
- Eye catching low-poly art-style inspired by early 64-bit video games.
- Fight your way through a procedurally assembled dungeon, randomizing from room to room.

- Challenging boss fights awaits in end of every dungeons. you'll need to master every tool in your disposal to come out on top.
